attributes.action: urge the BBC to keep Moira Stuart reading the news
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC is planning to drop the national institution that is Moira Stuart - one of the country's most loved and well known newsreaders.  Sign this petition to persuade the BBC to reconsider its decision and keep Moira on our screens.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
